data.name: WatermarkCreatorSettings_ModificationType_ExtractText
data.value: Extract hidden Watermark from image

data.name: WatermarkCreatorSettings_ModificationType_EmbedInvisibleText
data.value: Embed invisible watermark into the image

data.name: WatermarkCreatorSettings_ModificationType_EmbedText
data.value: Embed visible text into the image

data.name: ImageCaption
data.value: Image

data.name: ImageTooltip
data.value: The image which should be used to embed/extract a digital watermark.

data.name: PluginCaption
data.value: Watermark Creator

data.name: PluginTooltip
data.value: Writes or extracts a digital watermark of an image

data.name: ModificationTypeDes
data.value: Choose what kind of modification should be applied to the input image

data.name: BotLoc
data.value: Locate watermark at the bottom of the image

data.name: BoxSizeDes
data.value: The bigger the box, the higher the error correction, the more solid the watermark, but less data can be stored.

data.name: BoxSizeCap
data.value: Box size

data.name: WatermarkLocationDes
data.value: Choose the location where the watermark will be placed on the image.

data.name: OpacityDes
data.value: Opacity of the watermark. A higher value means more opacity and a stronger watermark, though it'll also become more visible. Maximum value is 1000. A value larger or equal 500 is recommended for a good result.

data.name: ErrorCorrectionDes
data.value: Set number of bytes used for error correction

data.name: ErrorCorrectionCap
data.value: Error correction

data.name: FontTypeCap
data.value: Font type

data.name: ModificationTypeCap
data.value: Modification type

data.name: OpacityCap
data.value: Opacity of the watermark

data.name: OtherLoc
data.value: Choose a custom location

data.name: Seed
data.value: Set some random number that will be used as seed

data.name: Seed1
data.value: Seed 1

data.name: Seed2
data.value: Seed 2

data.name: TextSizeMaxDes
data.value: Maximum size of the text to be used when embedding the watermark. Internally, the maximum possible size that fits the whole text onto the image in one line will be chosen.
data.comment: Size will be adjusted dynamically to fit the watermark into the image. You just need to define the maximum size.

data.name: TextSizeMaxCap
data.value: Maximum text size

data.name: TopLoc
data.value: Locate at top of the image

data.name: WatermarkLocationCap
data.value: Location of the watermark

data.name: AdvancedModeCap
data.value: Use advanced mode

data.name: AdvancedModeDes
data.value: Do you want to use advanced mode which offers more settings to be set by the user?

data.name: FontTypeDes
data.value: Font type that is used for the watermark

data.name: LocationPercentageCap
data.value: Custom location of the watermark

data.name: LocationPercentageDes
data.value: Allows to manually set the location of the watermark. The further to the right you put the slider, the further up to the top the watermark will move.

data.name: NoPictureError
data.value: Please provide a valid image as a carrier for the watermark, using the file input component

data.name: NoTextError
data.value: Please provide a string to be added to the image as a watermark, using the text input component

data.name: TextCaption
data.value: Embedded text

data.name: TextTooltip
data.value: Extracted text that was embedded in the image

data.name: WatermarkCaption
data.value: Watermark

data.name: WatermarkImageCaption
data.value: Image with watermark

data.name: WatermarkImageTooltip
data.value: Image with text added to it as a watermark

data.name: WatermarkTooltip
data.value: Text to be added to the image as a watermark

data.name: AdvancedModeList1
data.value: No

data.name: AdvancedModeList2
data.value: Yes
